course_title: Mastering Dog Dollars: Pro Dog Walking Business Management
description: Transform your dog walking business with this comprehensive course on utilizing Dog Dollars, covering bookings, scheduling, client management, and more.

lessons.title: Overview of Dog Dollars
lessons.description: Introduction to the Dog Dollars platform and its features for managing dog walking businesses.

lessons.title: Setting Up Your Account
lessons.description: Step-by-step guide on signing up and setting up your Dog Dollars account for the first time.

lessons.title: Smart Scheduling
lessons.description: How to use schedule blocks, recurring bookings, and the drag-and-drop calendar for efficient management.

lessons.title: Managing Bookings
lessons.description: Handling bookings, including creating, editing, and canceling them within the Dog Dollars platform.

lessons.title: Client Profiles
lessons.description: Creating and managing client profiles, including their pets, preferences, and booking history.

lessons.title: Visit Report Cards
lessons.description: How to send professional report cards with photos, potty reports, and notes after every walk.

lessons.title: Invoicing and Payments
lessons.description: Understanding how to generate invoices automatically and accept online payments through Dog Dollars.

lessons.title: GPS Tracking and Photo Updates
lessons.description: Using optional GPS tracking and photo updates to enhance the client experience.

lessons.title: Business Insights
lessons.description: How to use Dog Dollars' analytics to track revenue, walker performance, and client retention.

lessons.title: Scaling Your Business
lessons.description: Strategies for growing your dog walking business using Dog Dollars' features and insights.

lessons.title: Understanding Pricing Plans
lessons.description: Overview of Dog Dollars' pricing plans, including Starter, Pro, and Growth, and how to choose the right plan for your business.

lessons.title: Customizing Your Plan
lessons.description: How to customize your Dog Dollars plan as your business grows, including adding staff seats and upgrading features.
